description: Resume and CV writing, in this course is designed to help you craft professional, standout resumes and CVs tailored to your career goals. In this course, you will learn the key differences between resumes and CVs, how to effectively highlight your skills, achievements, and experience, and how to tailor your application for specific roles or industries. Explore essential formatting techniques, keyword optimization for applicant tracking systems (ATS), and strategies for creating strong professional summaries and cover letters. With practical tips and examples, this course empowers you to present your qualifications confidently and land interviews in competitive job markets.
